quote: “Those who travel to mountain-tops are half in love with themselves, and half in love with oblivion.”
author: Robert Macfarlane

quote: “A child may not know how to feed itself, or what to eat, yet it knows hunger.”
author: Daniel Keyes

quote: “Each day is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift to Him.”
author: T.D. Jakes

quote: “For the world is in a bad state, but everything will become still worse unless each of us does his best.”
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: “We have to pray with our eyes on God, not on the difficulties.”
author: Oswald Chambers

quote: “Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I am fallen, flawed and imperfect. Yet drenched in the grace and mercy that is found in Jesus Christ, there is strength”
author: Adam Young

quote: “May my heart be kind, my mind fierce, and my spirit brave.”
author: Kate Forsyth

quote: “Scars show us where we have been, they do not dictate where we are going.”
author: David Rossi

quote: “Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourslef or to gossip about others. Use your power of your word in the direction of truth and love.”
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: “It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.”
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: “Don't turn over the rocks if you don't want to see the pale creatures who live under them.”
author: Janet Fitch

quote: “He who speaks without an attentive ear is mute.”
author: Stephen King

quote: “You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore”
author: André Gide

quote: “Don't feel stupid if you don't like what everyone else pretends to love.”
author: Emma Watson

quote: “If freedom is short of weapons, we must compensate with willpower.”
author: Adolf Hitler

quote: “Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You can't change the wind but you can set your sails.”
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: “I wish I could make him understand that a loving good heart is riches enough, and that without it intellect is poverty.”
author: Mark Twain
